lead_paragraph: After the Penguins paraded the Stanley Cup through the streets of Pittsburgh, Sidney Crosby took it to his hometown of Cole Harbour, Nova Scotia, Evgeni Malkin to Moscow and Phil Kessel to a children's hospital in Toronto as part of the summer-long celebration.

headline.print_headline: NHL 2016-17: Odds Stacked Against Penguins Repeating
headline.main: NHL 2016-17: Odds Stacked Against Penguins Repeating
